description: Defines the architectural guidelines for this project including tech stack, framework usage, and design patterns.

rules.name: Tech Stack
rules.description: This project uses Next.js 15 with Emotion for styling, Chakra UI for UI components, and Supabase as the database.

rules.name: Component Structure
rules.description: Each component should be in its own file inside the components directory. Use index.ts for grouped exports.

rules.name: Routing
rules.description: Next.js app router (`app/`) is used instead of the old pages router. Keep all API routes in `app/api/`.
